resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81957</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81957</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4353</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Preparation for Work - CV writing and Form Filling</string>
            <string language="es">Preparación para trabajar – Creación de CV y cumplimentación de solicitudes de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Réiteach don Obair – Scríobh CV agus Líonadh Foirmeacha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vorbereitung für Arbeit - Lebenslauf Schreiben 
und Formular-Füllung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Préparation pour le travail - remplissage 
d'écriture et de forme de cv</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Preparação para o trabalho - enchimento da 
escrita e do formulário do CV</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Preparazione per lavoro - materiale da 
otturazione di scrittura e della forma del cv</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προετοιμασία για την εργασία - γράψιμο βιογραφικού 
σημειώματος και πλήρωση μορφής</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">As part of preparation for work placement students are asked to write a Curriculum Vitae and complete forms.This lesson explains all the items included on a C.V. and asks the student to write their own C.V. This lesson als gives the student guidelines on form filling.</string>
            <string language="es">Como parte de la preparación para las colocaciones laborales, se les pide a los estudiantes que escriban un curriculum vitae y rellenen solicitudes de trabajo. Esta lección explica todos los elementos incluidos en un cv y pide a los estudiantes que escrib</string>
            <string language="ga">Mar chuid den réiteach le haghaidh taithí oibre, iarrtar ar dhaltaí Curriculum Vitae a scríobh agus foirmeacha a chomhlíonadh. Míníonn an cheacht seo na rudaí go léir a théann ar C.V. agu iarrann sé ar na daltaí a C.V. féin a scríobh.  Tugann an cheacht s</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">LCA</string>
            <string language="es">LCA. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">ATF</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Als Teil der Vorbereitung für Arbeit Plazierung 
werden Kursteilnehmer gebeten, einen Lebenslauf zu schreiben und 
komplette forms.This Lektion erklärt alle Einzelteile, die auf einem 
C.V. eingeschlossen sind und bittet den Kursteilnehmer, ihr eigenes 
C.V. This zu schreiben, Lektion, die als dem Kursteilnehmer 
Richtlinien über Formularfüllung gibt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En tant qu'élément de la préparation pour le 
placement de travail des étudiants sont invités à écrire un 
Curriculum vitae et la leçon complète de forms.This explique tous les 
éléments inclus sur un C.V. et demande à l'étudiant d'écrire leur
propre C.V. This que les als de leçon donne à l'étudiant des 
directives sur le remplissage de forme.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Enquanto a parte da preparação para estudantes 
da colocação do trabalho está pedida para escrever um curriculum 
Vitae e a lição completa de forms.This explica todos os artigos 
incluídos em um C.V. e pede que o estudante escreva seu próprio C.V.
Este os als da lição que dão ao estudante guidelines no enchimento 
do formulário.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come componente della preparazione per la 
disposizione del lavoro gli allievi sono chiesti di scrivere un 
curriculum vitae e la lezione completa di forms.This spiega tutti gli 
articoli inclusi su un C.V. e chiede all'allievo di scrivere il loro 
proprio C.V. This i als di lezione che dà all'allievo la guida di 
riferimento sul materiale da otturazione della forma.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ως τμήμα της προετοιμασίας για την τοποθέτηση εργασίας
οι σπουδαστές καλούνται να γράψουν ένα βιογραφικό σημείωμα και 
πλήρεις μορφές Αυτό το μάθημα εξηγεί όλα τα αντικείμενα 
που περιλαμβάνονται C.V. και ζητά από το σπουδαστή για να 
γράψει C.V. τους Αυτή η νόσος του Alsheimer μαθήματος 
δίνει τις οδηγίες σπουδαστών για την πλήρωση μορφής.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.
